languages.text: Картина авторства Леди Кассии. Если очень долго в нее всматриваться под разными углами, то при должном воображении на ней можно угадать образ вашего судна... либо же важно кивнуть и соврать, что вы понимаете, что хотела сказать художница.

A painting by Lady Cassia. If you look at it closely from different angles and use your imagination, you might just be able to detect a resemblance to your ship... And if not, you can always nod your head wisely, and pretend to understand what the artist is trying to convey.
languages.original_text: Картина авторства Леди Кассии. Если очень долго в нее всматриваться под разными углами, то при должном воображении на ней можно угадать образ вашего судна... либо же важно кивнуть и соврать, что вы понимаете, что хотела сказать художница.

traits.locale_text: A painting by Lady Cassia. If one were to look closely at different angles and use their imagination well, they could detect a resemblance to your ship... or at least give a profound nod and lie about understanding what the artist was trying to convey.

A painting by Lady Cassia. If one were to look closely at different angles and use their imagination well, they could detect a resemblance to your ship... or at least give a profound nod and lie about understanding what the artist was trying to convey.

A painting by Lady Cassia. If you look at it closely from different angles and use your imagination, you might just be able to detect a resemblance to your ship... And if not, you can always nod your head wisely, and pretend to understand what the artist is trying to convey.

A painting by Lady Cassia. If you look at it closely from different angles and use your imagination, you might just be able to detect a resemblance to your ship... And if not, you can always nod your head wisely, and pretend to understand what the artist is trying to convey.

languages.text: Une œuvre de dame Cassia. Si vous le regardez attentivement sous différents angles et faites travailler votre imagination, vous parviendrez peut-être à lui trouver une vague ressemblance avec votre vaisseau... Autrement, vous pouvez toujours hocher la tête d'un air entendu en faisant semblant de comprendre ce que l'artiste a tenté d'exprimer.
languages.original_text: A painting by Lady Cassia. If you look at it closely from different angles and use your imagination, you might just be able to detect a resemblance to your ship... And if not, you can always nod your head wisely, and pretend to understand what the artist is trying to convey.

traits.locale_text: Une œuvre de dame Cassia. Si vous le regardez attentivement sous différents angles et faites travailler votre imagination, vous parviendrez peut-être à lui trouver une vague ressemblance avec votre vaisseau... Autrement, vous pouvez toujours hocher la tête d'un air entendu en faisant semblant de comprendre ce que l'artiste a tenté d'exprimer.

languages.text: Un cuadro de lady Cassia. Si lo miras de cerca desde distintos ángulos y usas tu imaginación, puede que detectes ciertas similitudes con tu nave... y, si no, siempre puedes asentir de forma sabia y fingir entender lo que quería expresar la pintora.
languages.original_text: A painting by Lady Cassia. If you look at it closely from different angles and use your imagination, you might just be able to detect a resemblance to your ship... And if not, you can always nod your head wisely, and pretend to understand what the artist is trying to convey.

traits.locale_text: Un cuadro de lady Cassia. Si lo miras de cerca desde distintos ángulos y usas tu imaginación, puede que detectes ciertas similitudes con tu nave... y, si no, siempre puedes asentir de forma sabia y fingir entender lo que quería expresar la pintora.

languages.text: 卡西娅女士画的画。如果从各个角度仔细观察，充分发挥想象力的话，说不定会觉得它和你的虚空舰有那么一丁点相似之处……就算你找不到任何相似之处，也可以故作高深地点点头，假装理解了作者想要传达的意思。
languages.original_text: A painting by Lady Cassia. If you look at it closely from different angles and use your imagination, you might just be able to detect a resemblance to your ship... And if not, you can always nod your head wisely, and pretend to understand what the artist is trying to convey.

traits.locale_text: 卡西娅女士画的画。如果从各个角度仔细观察，充分发挥想象力的话，说不定会觉得它和你的虚空舰有那么一丁点相似之处……就算你找不到任何相似之处，也可以故作高深地点点头，假装理解了作者想要传达的意思。

languages.text: カシア様の絵画。色々な角度から観察し、創造力を働かせると、あなたの船と似ている部分が見えてくるかもしれない…。もし見えないのなら、賢そうにうなずき、画家が表しているものを理解しているふりをする事も出来る。
languages.original_text: A painting by Lady Cassia. If you look at it closely from different angles and use your imagination, you might just be able to detect a resemblance to your ship... And if not, you can always nod your head wisely, and pretend to understand what the artist is trying to convey.

traits.locale_text: カシア様の絵画。色々な角度から観察し、創造力を働かせると、あなたの船と似ている部分が見えてくるかもしれない…。もし見えないのなら、賢そうにうなずき、画家が表しているものを理解しているふりをする事も出来る。

languages.text: Ein Gemälde von Lady Cassia. Wenn du es aus verschiedenen Blickwinkeln genau studierst und deine Fantasie einsetzt, kannst du vielleicht eine Ähnlichkeit zu deinem Schiff entdecken ... Und wenn nicht, kannst du immer noch weise nicken und vorgeben, zu verstehen, was der Künstler auszudrücken versucht hat.
languages.original_text: A painting by Lady Cassia. If you look at it closely from different angles and use your imagination, you might just be able to detect a resemblance to your ship... And if not, you can always nod your head wisely, and pretend to understand what the artist is trying to convey.

languages.text: Leydi Cassia'nın elinden çıkma bir tablo. Yaklaşarak farklı açılardan bakarsan ve hayal gücünü konuşturursan gemine benzer bir şeyler görebiliyorsun... Öyle değilse bile her zaman bir uzman gibi başını sallayabilir ve sanatçının ne anlatmak istediğini anlamış gibi yapabilirsin.
languages.original_text: A painting by Lady Cassia. If you look at it closely from different angles and use your imagination, you might just be able to detect a resemblance to your ship... And if not, you can always nod your head wisely, and pretend to understand what the artist is trying to convey.
